mods.name: Semac_IcarusOverhaul
mods.author: Semac
mods.description: Changes a little of almost everything.
mods.long_description: This Modpack changes a little of almost everything in the game with ideas taken from other mods and combines it all, and also includes JimK_Weapons_Mod

mods.name: Semac_IcarusOverhaul_Thor
mods.author: Semac
mods.description: Same as Semac_IcarusOverhaul but the Thor Dev Hammer is added.
mods.long_description: This Modpack changes a little of almost everything in the game with ideas taken from other mods and combines it all, and also includes JimK_Weapons_Mod, with Thor Dev Hammer

mods.name: Semac_IcarusOverhaulExtreme
mods.author: Semac
mods.description: An Extreme version of Semac_IcarusOverhaul, Hard difficulty is turned up to 11.
mods.long_description: This Modpack changes a little of almost everything in the game with ideas taken from other mods and combines it all, and also includes JimK_Weapons_Mod, Hard mode has Creature Speed Damage HP and spawn rates increased, also added 5 x Death Respawns instead of 3

mods.name: Semac_Meta_Lantern
mods.author: Semac
mods.description: Replaces the Meta Bandage with a refillable Lantern (Included with the Overhaul mods).
